title: Is the Prilepko book good for JEE Advanced preparation? - Quora

response.answer_text: No i suugest that you should not use this book for ur jee preparation this book has many high level and same types of problems which is not suitable for the jee genere type exams . I suggest u to use mostlty ur coaching study materials for preparations as they are specially made for jee to convey you the best concepts and allow you to prepare for all types of different problems which makes u to cope i with good problems .and help u to get a good score in jee .
It is definitely a very good book. But it should be done after NCERT and H C Verma . As you will not be able to catch-up the level of this book without clear fundamentals. ..!!
